An AndroMDA cartridge project looks like this on the file system:
<verbatim>
+ andromda-cartridgename
   + conf
   |  + test
   |       andromda.xml
   + src
   |  + java
   |     + org
   |        + andromda
   |           ... and so on
   |  + META-INF
   |  |    cartridge.xml
   |  |    metafacades.xml
   |  |    namespace.xml
   |  |    profile.xml
   |  + resources
   |  + templates
   |  |  + cartridgename
   |  |     + subdir1
   |  |     |    template1.vsl
   |  |     |    template2.vsl
   |  |     + subdir2
   |  |       template1.vsl
   |  |       template2.vsl
   |  |       template3.vsl
   |  + test
   |  + uml
   |      CartridgenameMetafacadeModel.xml.zip
   + target
   + xdocs
     maven.xml
     project.properties
     project.xml
</verbatim>

And this is how it should look like in the ProjectExplorer:
<verbatim>
+ andromda-cartridgename
  + Cartridge Descriptor <- Logical node, doubleclick to open Cartridge Descriptor editor
  + Metafacade Model     <- Logical node, doubleclik to open model in UML tool
  + templates
     + subdir1
     |    template1.vsl
     |    template2.vsl
     + subdir2
       template1.vsl
       template2.vsl
       template3.vsl
  + src                  <- mimick the original Package Explorer
     + org
        + andromda
           ... and so on
</verbatim>
